verses.text: Now it came to pass \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w death|strong="H4194"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, when \w David|strong="H1732"\w* was \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* from the \w slaughter|strong="H5221"\w* of the \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w*, and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* had \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* in \w Ziklag|strong="H6860"\w*;

It came even to pass on the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that, behold, a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* out of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* from \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* with his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w* \w rent|strong="H7167"\w*, and \w earth|strong="H0127"\w* upon his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*: and \add so\add* it was, when he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, that he \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* to the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and did \w obeisance|strong="H7812"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, From whence \w comest|strong="H0935"\w* thou? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Out of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* am I \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w How|strong="H4100"\w* went the \w matter|strong="H1697"\w*? I pray thee, \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* me. And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, That the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* are \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* from the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, and \w many|strong="H7235"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* also are \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* and \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*; and \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* are \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* also.\f + \fr 1.4 \ft How…: Heb. What was, etc\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the young \w man|strong="H5288"\w* that \w told|strong="H5046"\w* him, How \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* thou that \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* be \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*?

And the young \w man|strong="H5288"\w* that \w told|strong="H5046"\w* him \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, As I \w happened|strong="H7136"\w* by \w chance|strong="H7122"\w* upon \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Gilboa|strong="H1533"\w*, behold, \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w leaned|strong="H8172"\w* upon his \w spear|strong="H2595"\w*; and, lo, the \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* and \w horsemen|strong="H1167"\w* followed \w hard|strong="H1692"\w* after him.

And when he \w looked|strong="H6437"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* him, he \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* me, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* unto me. And I \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, Here \add am\add* I.\f + \fr 1.7 \ft Here…: Heb. Behold me\f*
And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Who \add art\add* thou? And I \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* him, I \add am\add* an \w Amalekite|strong="H6003"\w*.

He \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me again, \w Stand|strong="H5975"\w*, I pray thee, upon me, and \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* me: for \w anguish|strong="H7661"\w* is \w come|strong="H0270"\w* upon me, because my \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \add is\add* yet whole in me.\f + \fr 1.9 \ft anguish…: or, my coat of mail (or, my embroidered coat) hindereth me, that my, etc\f*

So I \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* upon him, and \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* him, because I was \w sure|strong="H3045"\w* that he could not \w live|strong="H2421"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that he was \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*: and I \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w crown|strong="H5145"\w* that \add was\add* upon his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and the \w bracelet|strong="H0685"\w* that \add was\add* on his \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, and have \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* them hither unto my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*.

Then \w David|strong="H1732"\w* took \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* on his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* them; and likewise all the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that \add were\add* with him:

And they \w mourned|strong="H5594"\w*, and \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*, and \w fasted|strong="H6684"\w* until \w even|strong="H6153"\w*, for \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and for \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and for the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; because they were \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the young \w man|strong="H5288"\w* that \w told|strong="H5046"\w* him, Whence \add art\add* thou? And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, I \add am\add* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of a \w stranger|strong="H0376"\w*, an \w Amalekite|strong="H6003"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, How wast thou not \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* to stretch \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*?

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the young \w men|strong="H5288"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Go \w near|strong="H5066"\w*, \add and\add* \w fall|strong="H6293"\w* upon him. And he \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him that he \w died|strong="H4191"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thy \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \add be\add* upon thy \w head|strong="H7218"\w*; for thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* hath \w testified|strong="H6030"\w* against thee, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, I have \w slain|strong="H4191"\w* the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*.

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w lamented|strong="H6969"\w* with this \w lamentation|strong="H7015"\w* over \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and over \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*:

(Also he \w bade|strong="H0559"\w* them \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \add the use of\add* the \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*: behold, \add it is\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of \w Jasher|strong="H3477"\w*.)\f + \fr 1.18 \ft of Jasher: or, of the upright\f*

The \w beauty|strong="H6643"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* is \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* upon thy high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*: how are the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*!

\w Tell|strong="H5046"\w* \add it\add* not in \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*, \w publish|strong="H1319"\w* \add it\add* not in the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* of \w Askelon|strong="H0831"\w*; lest the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*, lest the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of the \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* \w triumph|strong="H5937"\w*.

Ye \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Gilboa|strong="H1533"\w*, \add let there be\add* no \w dew|strong="H2919"\w*, neither \add let there be\add* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w*, upon you, nor \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* of \w offerings|strong="H8641"\w*: for there the \w shield|strong="H4043"\w* of the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* is vilely cast \w away|strong="H1602"\w*, the \w shield|strong="H4043"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \add as though he had\add* not \add been\add* \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.

From the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*, from the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* of the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w*, the \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* of \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w turned|strong="H7734"\w* not \w back|strong="H0268"\w*, and the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* not \w empty|strong="H7387"\w*.

\w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \add were\add* \w lovely|strong="H0157"\w* and \w pleasant|strong="H5273"\w* in their \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*, and in their \w death|strong="H4194"\w* they were not \w divided|strong="H6504"\w*: they were \w swifter|strong="H7043"\w* than \w eagles|strong="H5404"\w*, they were \w stronger|strong="H1396"\w* than \w lions|strong="H0738"\w*.\f + \fr 1.23 \ft pleasant: or, sweet\f*

Ye \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, weep \w over|strong="H1058"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, who \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* you in \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, with \add other\add* \w delights|strong="H5730"\w*, who \w put|strong="H5927"\w* on \w ornaments|strong="H5716"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* upon your \w apparel|strong="H3830"\w*.

How are the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*! O \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*, \add thou wast\add* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* in thine high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*.

I am \w distressed|strong="H6887"\w* for thee, my \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*: \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w pleasant|strong="H5276"\w* hast thou been unto me: thy \w love|strong="H0160"\w* to me was \w wonderful|strong="H6381"\w*, passing the \w love|strong="H0160"\w* of \w women|strong="H0802"\w*.
How are the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*, and the \w weapons|strong="H3627"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w perished|strong="H0006"\w*!
